con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://example.com/gestionordenes" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sch="http://example.com/soap/gestionordenes" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://example.com/gestionordenes"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://example.com/soap/gestionordenes" xmlns:tns="http://example.com/soap/gestionordenes" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--Producto type definition--> <xs:complexType name="producto"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="nombre" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="precio" type="xs:double"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Orden type definition--> <xs:complexType name="orden"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="cliente" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="total" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="productos" type="tns:producto"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Request for creating orders--> <xs:element name="crearOrdenRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="cliente" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="productos" type="tns:producto"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--Response for creating orders--> <xs:element name="crearOrdenResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ordenId" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="cliente" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="total" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="productos" type="tns:producto"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--Request for listing orders--> <xs:element name="listarOrdenesRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="clienteId" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--Response for listing orders--> <xs:element name="listarOrdenesResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="ordenes" type="tns:orden"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="crearOrdenRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:crearOrdenRequest" name="crearOrdenRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listarOrdenesResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:listarOrdenesResponse" name="listarOrdenesResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="crearOrdenResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:crearOrdenResponse" name="crearOrdenResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listarOrdenesRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:listarOrdenesRequest" name="listarOrdenesRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="OrdenesPort"> <wsdl:operation name="crearOrden"> <wsdl:input message="tns:crearOrdenRequest" name="crearOrdenRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:crearOrdenResponse" name="crearOrdenResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listarOrdenes"> <wsdl:input message="tns:listarOrdenesRequest" name="listarOrdenesRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:listarOrdenesResponse" name="listarOrdenesResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="OrdenesPortSoap11" type="tns:OrdenesPort"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="crearOrden"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="crearOrdenRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="crearOrdenResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listarOrdenes"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="listarOrdenesRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="listarOrdenesResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="OrdenesPortService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:OrdenesPortSoap11" name="OrdenesPortSoap11"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/ws"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ges="http://example.com/soap/gestionordenes"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ges:crearOrdenRequest> <!-- Nombre del cliente --> <ges:cliente>Juan Pérez</ges:cliente> <!-- Lista de productos --> <ges:productos> <ges:nombre>Producto 1</ges:nombre> <ges:precio>150.50</ges:precio> </ges:productos> <ges:productos> <ges:nombre>Producto 2</ges:nombre> <ges:precio>250.00</ges:precio> </ges:productos> </ges:crearOrdenRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
